Government
==========

[![](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/files/assets/city/v/3/news/articles-city-council-chamber.jpg?dimension=largethumbnail&w=498&h=332)

City Government
---------------

Discover the heart of Arlington's local government at City Hall, including meetings, elected officials, and the City Secretary's Office.](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/Government/City-Government)

[![](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/files/assets/city/v/1/health-services/images/hoteliers_meeting_2020_08.jpg?dimension=largethumbnail&w=498&h=332)

Meetings & Agendas
------------------

Information on upcoming meetings, agendas, and past meeting minutes.](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/Government/Meetings-Agendas)

[![](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/files/assets/city/v/1/_dev/button-images/arlington_star_art.jpg?dimension=largethumbnail&w=498&h=332)

Departments
-----------

An overview of the city's various departments, contact details and services offered.](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/Government/Departments)

[![](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/files/assets/city/v/2/city-secretary/images/i-voted-today.jpg?dimension=largethumbnail&w=498&h=332)

Elections & Voting
------------------

Learn about upcoming elections, voter registration, and essential election resources, including Council District maps.](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/Government/Elections-Voting)

[![](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/files/assets/city/v/2/fire/images/bts_30.jpg?dimension=largethumbnail&w=498&h=332)

Public Safety
-------------

Explore safety resources, tips, and emergency preparedness to help ensure a thriving and secure city for all.](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/Government/Public-Safety)

[![](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/files/assets/city/v/2/municipal-court/images/municipal-courts.jpg?dimension=largethumbnail&w=498&h=332)

Municipal Court
---------------

Easy access to information on court hours, location, payment options, citations, warrants, and other court related matters.](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/Government/Municipal-Court)

[![](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/files/assets/city/v/1/finance/images/finance.jpg?dimension=largethumbnail&w=498&h=332)

Budget & Finance
----------------

Stay informed on how your tax dollars are being invested to improve the local economy, public safety, and quality of life.](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/Government/Budget-Finance)

[![](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/files/assets/city/v/1/arlington-tomorrow-foundation/images/happy_children.jpg?dimension=largethumbnail&w=498&h=332)

Records
-------

Access City of Arlington's records options.](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/Government/Records)

Jobs & Volunteering
-------------------

Whether you're looking to start a career or give back to the community, there are various ways to get involved and make a difference.](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/Government/Jobs-Volunteering)

[![](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/files/assets/city/v/1/esports-stadium/images/contact-us-arlington-expo-center.jpg?dimension=largethumbnail&w=498&h=332)

Contact Us
----------

Find important contact information for City of Arlington departments, including emergency services, housing, public works, code compliance, and more.](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/Government/Contact-Us)

[![](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/files/assets/city/v/1/strategic-initiatives/images/open_data.jpg?dimension=largethumbnail&w=498&h=332)

Data & Information
------------------

Explore the City of Arlington’s commitment to transparency with easy access to financial reports, artificial intelligence policies, legislative documents, and more!](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/Government/Data-Information)
